name: Rose
description: A classic red rose, symbolizing love and romance.

name: SunFlower
description: Bright yellow sunflowers that bring joy and happiness.

name: Hydrangea
description: Large, colorful blooms perfect for garden landscapes.

name: Tulip
description: Elegant tulips available in a variety of colors.

name: Lavender
description: Fragrant purple lowers known for their calming properties.

name: Orchid
description: Exotic and elegant flowers perfect for indoor decoration.

name: Daisy
description: Cheerful white flowers with yellow centers, symbolizing innocence.

name: Lily
description: Elegant and fragrant flowers available in various colors.

name: Chrysanthemum
description: Vibrant autumn flowers in a wide range of colors and shapes.

name: Peony
description: Large, lush flowers known for their beauty and fragrance.

name: Carnation
description: Ruffled flowers available in a variety of colors, often used in bouquets.

name: Iris
description: Distinctive flowers with unique petal arrangements, symbolizing wisdom.

name: Dahlia
description: Showy flowers with intricate petal patterns in bold colors.

name: Snapdragon
description: Tall spikes of colorful flowers resembling dragon heads.

name: Azalea
description: Clusters of vibrant flowers perfect for shrubs and landscaping.
